name: A Red Sky at Dawn
description:
October 1941, Singapore.

A dead body inside the former courthouse.

Five witnesses who may be possible suspects.

And a new detective paired with an unwilling veteran.

Can you unravel the mystery behind A Red Sky at Dawn?

* Note: This interactive story uses the browser to save your progress. Please enable third party cookies for it to work properly.

** Note to mobile users: This requires a 40mb download. Please use WiFi to save data.

Click or touch the text to progress. Long press while in the story to access the menu.
